document.full_text: greek prime minister george papandreou on saturday denied there was even unofficial discussion over greece quitting the euro zone and asked that his troubled country be "left alone to finish its task."
document.title: greek pm denies euro exit; says leave greece alone
lines_and_colors: greek prime minister george papandreou on saturday denied there was even unofficial discussion over greece quitting the euro zone and asked that his troubled country be "left alone to finish its task."
